walkTo(SuffixNode, String, int, int) - Method in class de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.algo.suffixtrees.UkkonenSuffixTree
This method is used to walk down the tree, from a given node.
Wildcards - Class in de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.algo
Wildcard matching check, as described in Gusfield 1999:199 f.
Wildcards() - Constructor for class de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.algo.Wildcards
 
WordSuffixTree - Class in de.uni_koeln.spinfo.strings.algo.suffixtrees
Implementation based on the linear-time algorithm for constructing word-based suffix trees as described by Andersson, Larsson & Swansson in Algorithmica 23, 1999

Subclasses a modified UkkonenSuffixTree class from BioJava API, builds a word based tree with symbols representing the words which are stored separately in a map

TODO implement LCE over LCA (then kmismatch an wildcards are running in linear time), see LCE
